title: Looking for a serif mate for Gotham
content:
I have recently decided to use Gotham on a rebranding project. I am having difficulties selecting the right serif face to work with Gotham. I plan to use the serif face for body copy on various collateral. Any suggestions? Thanks

 [‹ Complementary Sans Serif for Beaufort](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152620/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45012 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type Project - Evolution of Visual Language. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152620/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44914 "Go to next forum topic")
author: willow35
